t: The Food52 Cookbook, Volume 2: Seasonal Recipes from Our Kitchens to Yours (Food52, 2): Hesser, Amanda, Stubbs, Merrill: 9780061887291: Amazon.com: Books
'This is about brand awareness': Why Food52 is partnering with Nordstrom
s: May 4, 2022 - The kitchen and home-focused media and commerce company announced last week that Nordstrom will begin selling its direct-to-consumer produce line. Food52, which was first known for recipes and food-focused digital media, has been slowly growing its own product line, called Five Two.
